name: Tetanus
uniques: Heal this unit by [-5] HP <upon ending a turn in a [All] tile>

name: HIV
uniques: All adjacent units heal [-5] HP when healing

name: Covid
uniques: Heal this unit by [-12] HP <upon ending a turn in a [All] tile> <for units without [Cure Covid]>

name: Hypertension
uniques: This Unit gains the [Cerebral Infarction] promotion <with [12]% chance> <upon ending a turn in a [All] tile>

name: Cerebral Infarction
uniques: Doing so will consume this opportunity to choose a Promotion

name: Nausea
uniques: This Unit gains [-1] XP <upon ending a turn in a [All] tile>
